data.title: Power plant profile: Latakia Combined Cycle Power Plant, Syria
data.meta_description: The Latakia Combined Cycle Power Plant is 540MW gas fired power project. It is planned in Latakia, Syria.
data.text:
Description

It is a Combined Cycle Gas Turbine (CCGT) power plant.

Development status

The project construction is expected to commence from 2019. Subsequent to that it will enter into commercial operation by 2025.

Contractors involved

MAPNA Group will be the turbine supplier for the Gas fired project. The Gas fired project consists of 2 gas turbines.

MAPNA Group will be the turbine supplier for the Gas fired project. The Gas fired project consists of 1 steam turbine.

MAPNA Group is expected to be the supplier electric generator for the project.

For more details on Latakia Combined Cycle Power Plant, buy the profile here.

This content was updated on 14 May 2024
